alert.note: Alert for Allen; Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued March 23 at 5:14PM EDT until March 23 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 66 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN INDIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN NORTHERN INDIANA ALLEN IN DE KALB LAGRANGE NOBLE STEUBEN WHITLEY IN MICHIGAN THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST MICHIGAN BRANCH HILLSDALE ST. JOSEPH MI IN OHIO THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST OHIO ALLEN OH DEFIANCE FULTON OH HENRY PAULDING PUTNAM VAN WERT WILLIAMS THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALBION, ANGOLA, ANTWERP, ARCHBOLD, AUBURN, BLUFFTON, BRONSON, BRYAN, COLDWATER, COLUMBIA CITY, COLUMBUS GROVE, CONTINENTAL, DEFIANCE, DELTA, DESHLER, EDGERTON, FORT WAYNE, FREMONT, GARRETT, HICKSVILLE, HILLSDALE, JONESVILLE, KENDALLVILLE, LAGRANGE, LEIPSIC, LIBERTY CENTER, LIGONIER, LIMA, LITCHFIELD, MENDON, MONTPELIER, NAPOLEON, NEW HAVEN, OHIO CITY, OTTAWA, PANDORA, PAULDING, PAYNE, SHERWOOD, SHIPSHEWANA, SOUTH WHITLEY, SPENCERVILLE, STURGIS, SWANTON, THREE RIVERS, TOPEKA, TRI-LAKES, VAN WERT, WAUSEON, AND WHITE PIGEON.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert; Williams
